description: The Active Directory Permissions Update is a security enhancement aimed at mitigating vulnerabilities associated with permissions in Active Directory environments. This update specifically addresses CVE-2021-42291, which may allow unauthorized users to exploit permission issues. The corrective measures included in this update ensure appropriate permissions are set for user accounts and reduce the risk of unauthorized access. Administrators should apply this update to maintain the integrity and security of their Active Directory infrastructure. The detailed explanation for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.
